name: leaflet.styledlayercontrol
description: A Leaflet plugin that implements the management and control of layers by organization into categories or groups. The StyledLayerControl class extends the original L.control.layers control. The plugin uses HTML5 and CSS3 to style the presentation in a modern way. The initial ideas were based in the plugin: Leaflet.Groupedlayercontrol
author: davicustodio
